

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'uqbu5gc0cau6pq3up9lkjkpj05'
            and expiry > '1354782498';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code, title, symbol_left, symbol_right, decimal_point,
                                  thousands_point, decimal_places, value
                          from currencies;
